#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
bool checkvowel(char a)
{
    if(a=='a' || a=='e' || a=='i'|| a=='o'|| a=='u')
        return true;
    else
        return false;
}
int main()
{
    char s='f',b;
    int i;

while(s!='\n')
{
    scanf("%c",&s);
    if(checkvowel(s)==true)
    {
      scanf("%c",&b);
      scanf("%c",&b);
    }

        printf("%c",s);

}


    return 0;
}
